mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(name, phone, address, owner_id, introduction) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{ownerId}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone, address, owner_id, open_status, introduction, created_at, updated_at FROM STORE WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}
SELECT id, name, phone, address, owner_id, open_status, introduction, created_at, updated_at FROM STORE WHERE id = #{storeId} AND owner_id = #{ownerId}
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM STORE WHERE id = #{storeId} AND owner_id = #{ownerId})
